text: phwk khea klaw wa thi than ma ha phwk rea nan pheux wa rea ca di khearph sakkara xallxhˌ tæ pheiyng xngkh deiyw læa lathing sing thi brrda brrphburusʹ khxng phwk rea khey khearph sakkarama kranan hrux cng na sing thi than di sayya kæ phwk rea mayang phwk rea theid hak than xyu nı hmu phu phud cring
